author: Philip Downes
text:
With Seachtain na Gaeilge wrapping up this weekend, Ireland looking to win the Six Nations on Saturday, and St Patrick’s Day on Sunday, it has never been a better week to be Irish.
But while Gaeilge is our first language, some of us may not have been paying attention in those Irish lessons (yours truly included), and others might be fluent in the language, being proper Gaeilgeóir’s.
Today's top videos STORY CONTINUES BELOW Do you know your cúpla focail? Do you know your is breá liom’s from your an bhfuil cead agam dul go dtí on leithreas’? We at Extra.ie have compiled a handy quiz in honour of Seachtain na Gaeilge to test your knowledge of the language.
Irish Language Quiz – Seachtáin Na Gaeilge
What does Sláinte mean? How do you say ‘excuse me’ What object is shown above? Name this animal What is the correct translation for ‘Aithníonn ciaróg, ciaróg eile’ Name this object How do you say ‘where is the hospital?’ What does this proverb mean? ‘Ní neart go cur le chéile’ Name this tasty treat What does this proverb mean? ‘Is treise an dúchas ná an oiliúint’ What does this proverb mean? ‘Mol an óige agus tiocfaidh sí’ What object is shown above? Name this object What is the correct translation for ‘Blonde’ How do you say ‘Did you go on holiday this summer?’
